rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0001
rows.name: Lao![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0002
rows.name: Hey...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0003
rows.name:
You can't be serious...
Your entire team? ...Gone?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0004
rows.name: Dead. Killed by Ganglion. And it's all my fault.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0005
rows.name: If only we'd gotten here sooner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0006
rows.name: What, you think you could have stopped it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0007
rows.name: What's it matter, anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0008
rows.name:
We can just bring them all back
once we find the Lifehold, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0009
rows.name: Hey, Lao...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0010
rows.name: Look at us, the chosen few.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0011
rows.name:
All those people we left on Earth...
They never had a chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0012
rows.name:
But us? We can be reborn.
We get as many damn chances as we want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0013
rows.name:
IF we find the core.
Without that, there's no chance—for any of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Look, we can talk later—for now,
we need to get you back to the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0015
rows.name: Let's regroup there so we can get you patched up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0016
rows.name: No way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0017
rows.name:
What if it turns out to be the core
and the Ganglion get to it first?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0018
rows.name: You can't let that happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0019
rows.name: We can't just leave you here, Lao![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0020
rows.name:
You can and you will.
I'll be fine until the Reclaimers can get here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0021
rows.name: Still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0022
rows.name: I'm sending you all the intel we have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0023
rows.name:
It's further north from here.
Sorry I can't help—it's up to you now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0024
rows.name: Don't worry—we can handle it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Let's get moving. With luck, we can secure
the Lifehold before the Ganglion know we're here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0026
rows.name: Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0027
rows.name: Yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0028
rows.name:
Maybe you should sit this one out.
The place is crawling with Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0029
rows.name: That's why I'm going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0029_2
rows.name: Exactly why.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0030
rows.name: I'm part of a team, and we have a job to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0031
rows.name:
If it's going to be dangerous,
that's all the more reason for us to stick together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0032
rows.name: And I'm a lot more capable than you think, Lao.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0033
rows.name:
But I know you're trying to look out for me.
And I appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0034
rows.name:
It's not like they'll be killed...
They'll just lose their mims, is all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0035
rows.name: What's it matter, anyway...[ST:wait ]
